cardtypes.cardp: The first and unique card that you can brand with your personal or company name. The Al Haslah Gold Card allows you to transfer larger amounts save and secure via the e-dirham payment platform.

cardAtrribute.cardAttri: Magnetic Stripe
Visa Cobranded Card– Accepted at worldwide merchants and at e-Dirham G2 merchants
Two year expiry date printed on the card
Card number. and serial number printed on card
Name of Cardholder not printed on card
Cardholder picture not printed on card

cardtypes.cardfeaturesp: Load corresponds to the first time you deposit cash in your card. Please ensure to keep the Activation Code printed on your load receipt to enable you to set a Passcode.

cardfeature.feature: All NBAD branches in the UAE

cardtypes.cardreloadp: Reload corresponds to subsequent times you deposit cash in your card after first load.

cardreload.reload: All NBAD branches in the UAE for a fee of AED 8

howtousep: E-Dirham is an easy, convenient and secure payment platform for everyone in the UAE. Use your Al Haslah card, Mobile or online solutions and much more with great ease. Find all your information here or contact our helpdesk if you require any further information.
howtousepm: E-Dirham is an easy, convenient and secure payment platform for everyone in the UAE.
wheretousep: You can pay with e-dirham at most of the UAE Ministries, Merchants, Typing centers and much more. Find out all the locations to top up your accounts and make payments via the ED Kiosk, ED Mobile or Online.
wheretousepm: You can pay with e-dirham at most of the UAE Ministries, Merchants, Typing centers, and much more.
choose: Choose what Suits best for me
choosep: E-Dirham wizard will help you find out which card suits best for your need
whichcard: Which card is right for you?
